Title: Requires owners to provide prospective lessees with notification where lead-based paint or lead contaminated dust has been found in the rental unit
Summary: Requires owners to provide prospective lessees with notification where lead-based paint or lead contaminated dust has been found and any and all abatement measures that have been taken in the rental unit.
LawCode: Amd ยง27-2056.4, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring owners to provide prospective lessees with notification where lead-based paint or lead contaminated dust has been found in the dwelling and any and all abatement measures that have been taken
